--> Gem Cluster (1)

--> Shrine Vessel (1)

--> Corrupted Cluster (1)

name: Scroll
spelldescstr:
60
(1/4)

You've made it here... I've left this note 
hidden here so that only a worthy hero 
could find it. Our final confict, the
Uileloscadh Mór, is upon us. Baal's 
corruption has enveloped Scosglen, and 
soon will spread in all of Sanctuary...

Druids, over the centuries, have been 
mastering the art of the Dubhdroiacht, 
allowing us control over the forces of 
nature. This forest is the birthplace 
of our greatest creation: the Dúlra 
Aegis. We must stop the Lord of 
Destruction before he obtains it.

Please, muster your resolve and look 
for the other pages of my diary. Reach 
the farmfields and look for a chest near 
a hut, I believe you'll find it as this 
message found you. Watch out, as
bloody rituals are frequent in that area.

name: Scroll
spelldescstr:
60
(2/4)

This device was born from the desire to 
protect our home during the foretold 
calamity; but now, in a twist of fate, it 
could grant Baal authority over 
unspeakable power... thankfully 
assembling it is far from a simple task. 
The artifact itself was never completed 
because of the threat of its potential 
misuse, and the instructions were split 
into multiple designs that Túr Dúlra 
experts swore to protect.

After harvesting the information he 
needed, Baal has corrupted almost all of 
the guardians! He has used the artifact 
to reach an unknown location, hiding his 
presence and pressing his advantages.

Making our own Dúlra Aegis may be 
our best and only step on the path to 
his defeat.

The third page of the diary is in a chest 
nearby the Sky Altar, on a stony ground
perpetually bathed by sunbeams. 
It's south of the farmfields.

name: Scroll
spelldescstr:
56
(3/4)

Before building the Dúlra Aegis, several 
tenets need to be crafted first. Obtaining 
the design tomes by defeating the now 
corrupted guardian Druids could prove 
very difficult, but it's a necessity. Keep 
also in mind that not all of them carry 
the designs, but It's rumored that some 
may even carry already crafted tenets.

Intrepid warrior, you must press on or 
all of our struggle will have been for 
naught.

After assembling all Tenets, look for the 
fourth page of the diary: it's in a hut 
close to the forest portal entrance, 
where you first stepped here.

name: Scroll
spelldescstr:
60
(4/4)

These four diary pages you've collected 
can be combined together and 
transmuted into the final design for the 
Dulra Aegis.

Once you have the Dulra Aegis, you will
need a special ingredient to breach into
Baal's refuge. You need to travel to the
cemetery at the East and look deep. The 
Aegis will require much conjuring power.

When you are ready to fight him, head
to the Ancient Circle at the North East. 
Beware as he has control over the 
natural elements, you're not fighting 
only him but also the twisted wrath of 
these lands.

It is now time to face our greatest 
enemy. Prepare.
